summary: A woman discovers the truth about her former lover from the diary that his first wife wrote to their son, Nicholas.
cast: Christina Applegate|Johnathon Schaech|Kathleen Rose Perkins|Jenna Friedenberg|Kevin Jubinville|Craig Eldridge|Hal Eisen|Jackie Torrens|Richard Donat|Trevor Hayes|John Dunsworth|Jennifer Overton|Wanda Taylor
title: El diario de Suzanne
